metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7549 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In params.c in zsh through 5.4.2, there is a crash during a copy of an empty hash table, as demonstrated by typeset -p.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7549` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zsh - 5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1
zsh-common - 5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1
zsh-static - 5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zsh package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1').
